name: HELLBORNE (Dirty Cook Studio LLC)
description:
Controls: Jump
  • (Keyboard) Up Arrow (Version0.02 and above)
  • (Keyboard) W key (Version0.02 and above)
  • (Xbox Controller) A button (Version0.02 and above)
Attack
  • (Keyboard) Space Bar (Version0.02 and above)
  • (Xbox Controller) X button (Version0.02 and above)
  • (Xbox Controller) Right Trigger (Version0.02 and above)
THIS IS HELLBORNE

Hellborne is a hack and slash infinite runner. Travel through time, slay demons, save humanity.

This infinite runner was developed for  the Devtober 2021 Game Jam. Over the course of 31 days, we accepted the challenge to completely design and create an entire game using only our skills and experience. Like how scratch cooking creates an entire meal from only base raw ingredients, we created this entire project from custom made music, art, design, and code. We also publicly published our entire development of this project on Youtube:   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0Du-kmXDk8RjGJNxWs7ETw.

You can also play the demo HERE

Early Access

This game is in active development. You can show your support for us and this game by purchasing this version. As of Alpha Version0.02 we are only available for Windows but we do have plans to move to a mobile launch for both Android and Apple.

What Is Included With Purchase

A purchase of this game includes the following:

  • The standalone Windows version of the HELLBORNE game developed for Devtober 2021. 
  • Free upgrades for this game including content and cosmetic
  • Special Early Access Armor (Not currently available)
  • A free download for either the Apple or Android version (Not currently Available)
Some of the updates and features that are coming with this version are as follows
  • Boss Fights
  • Major UI and UX changes
    • Complete lighting overhaul
    • Menu changes
    • Camera behavior changes
    • HUD changes within game play
  • Gameplay changes and updates 
  • Auto Saving
  • Gear (Unlockable Armor) 
  • Scoring based on how well you do
  • In game currency to purchase upgrades
  • Shop for purchasing upgrades
  • Leaderboard for showing off that high score
  • Mobile releases
